item.title: The Chemodan – Our Hip-Hop (Наш Хип-Хоп)
item.description: By The Chemodan ( Facebook , VK ). Featuring Эфди Вадим (Efdi/fd Vadim, VK ) and ОУ74 ( 24smi , VK ). Video featuring Denis Sladkov (Denis Sladkov). Directed by Лёша Ломов (Lesja Lomov, Instagram , YouTube ).
